project.projectDescription: In order to study about a given flight in more detailed and to see if it will be delayed has a relationship between the given information of the scheduled departure. - First by build multiple linear regression - Follow the set a hypothesis test - F test - Compare the F- statistics with F = MS reg /MS res, also compare the p-value - Finally, to have a conclusion
project.dataDescription: The airlines dataset has been cleaned and reduce to 399 rows. The columns that I will use which are Time (duration of flight), Length (distance between airports) and Delay (the number of delay).
project.researchQuestion: Is there a linear relationship between the flight will be delayed and duration of the flight and the distance between airports? Preform this test at the alpha = 0.05 level
project.conclusion: Reject the null hypothesis since F-statistic is 4.832 which greater than 3.018566. We also have significant evidence at the alpha =0.05 level that beta_time not equal to 0. There is evidence of a linear association between the delay of flight and Time(duration of flight).
